component.name: getAvailableModules
component.description: Retrieves a list of available modules in the system.

component.name: getRecordCountForModule
component.description: Retrieves a list of beans based on query specifications.

component.name: getModuleFields
component.description: Retrieves the list of field vardefs for a specific module.

component.name: searchByModule
component.description: Searches modules for a string and returns matched records.
